title: Fundamental Practical Competency Enhancement Program Based on Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and basic clinical skill comprehension
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing the cultivation of practical application skills for non-degree-seeking adult learners.

learning_goals: Ability to perform standard infection control procedures with 100% compliance in simulation environments.
Achievement of 80%+ accuracy in clinical judgment applying patient safety principles in high-risk scenarios.
Utilization of therapeutic communication skills (empathy, reflection, clarification) three or more times in communication with standardized patients (SPs).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
